attributes.title: terrible.
attributes.review: This app has been making my brand new iphone 11 pro max glitch ever since i downloaded it. it is not my phone as the problem it is this terrible app. this app hasn’t only been making my phone glitch, it has also been making my friends and family’s phones and ipads glitch a lot. do NOT recommend this app. it is disappointing to see such a horrible app on this app store.

attributes.title: I don’t k ow why I tried
attributes.review: I downloaded the app because it would nice to know which side is doing what. Keep my options open, it was a standard download, then I gave my info away. Then I noticed the app started to crash. I’d reopen it, and. Would still crash. I tried restarting my phone, even deleting and downloading again. I don’t know, I have an iPhone 11 and haven’t had any problem. So I’m assuming it has to be this app.

attributes.title: Tik Tok🥰✨🌱
attributes.review: This app is horrible I took me 🧸1 week🧸 to download it😐and, this app is very laggy. I downloaded this so then I can keep up with the news, but you can barely read anything that’s on the app the words are soo 💗tiny💗 you need glasses to read anything like, articles, etc....😚our 🍊orange🍊 president did a horrible job making this app😂 and sense you want to delete 🥵Tik Tok🥵 we are gonna delete your app to sweaty✨🇺🇸Trump 202🇺🇸 🌱but🌱 on a 🥵❤️gravestone!❤️🥵

attributes.title: hOrRiBlE aPp
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app and I touched it it said make America better which he’s making it WoRsE but then he asked for my number but hes mArRiEd, but we don’t want to think our “non racist homophobic” president is a cheater right? Then he came to my house and ate my pet dinosaur. Then he went to McDonald’s to get orange juice cause he called him self an oRaNgE which he is an orange indeed!! I downloaded this app to make America bEtTer but then he kept spamming me.. oBaMa 2020 guys

attributes.title: TikTok lives matter👁👄👁
attributes.review: He is taking our voice away and when I went into the apps bunch of trump faces started appearing all over my screen then there was a picture of his nudes like I don’t think you should be showing that to people it’s disturbing and very slow now my phone won’t stop glitching and why would you expose his nudes on the internet this app is the worst app ever and it needs to be taken down

attributes.title: horrible.
attributes.review: I WAS a trump supporter, and I HATED this app. It has no purpose and is very dumb, I’m starting to see more and more things about trump, and I’m starting to think maybe he ISN'T a good president for America. this not only is useless, it is a grab at attention, stay in your lane trump, you didn’t see the other presidents posting on twitter all day about things you could just keep to yourself, you are an ugly disgusting man, you’re a president, start ACTING like it.

attributes.title: Remove this app
attributes.review: I downloaded it and it took up all of the storage on my phone. I would never recommend this to anyone because it is terrible for your phone. I couldn’t open any other apps or take pictures. This app turned my phone into a dictatorship where it decided what I could and couldn’t do. I am very disappointed by it and would never recommend this controlling app to anyone.

attributes.title: This app is so faulty
attributes.review: I wish I could give it a zero star because its so useless. I downloaded this app to follow President trumps news but ever since I did my phone has been ruining out of charge so fast and crashing so much no matter which app I’m on. I could be on Facebook or candy crush and my phone will just crash, I looked up a customer service phone number so I can complain but I couldn’t find one. BAD QUALITY AND BAD SERVICE!

attributes.title: It was amazing
attributes.review: Fist of all everything that trump is doing is amazing and the app helps me see what he’ll do in the election. Everything about this app is wonderful. I hope you think the same way. Trump 2020

attributes.title: I do not recommend this terrifying app.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of getting some information about the next presidential election. Instead, the app completely glitched and a horrific monster jumped out of my screen! The monster was orange and it was shapeshifting. The monster shape-shifted into items all around my house. IT ATE MY DOG AND MY FISH. Therefore, I do not recommend this app so...👽⟟⏁⋉⟒👽⟒⋔⍜⊑👽⍀⏃⏁⏃⌿⏃⍀⏃⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⎍⋔⎍👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍀⏃⏁⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⌰⏃⏁⟒⟒⎅⏃⟒👽⋔⍜⟒👽⎅⍜⍀⟟⋔⟒👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽⍜⌰⋔⟒⋏⏃👽⎅⟒⌿⏃⎅⏃⍀⟟👽⏃⋔⟒⋏⍜👽 ⎅⟟⋔⟒⎅⏃⟒👽. OMG THE MONSTER SHAPE-SHIFTED INTO MY PHONE AND HACKED IT AGHHHH.✨✨💞 NOT ONLY THAT, KANYE WEST AND TRUMP JUMPED OUT OF MY PHONE AND ATTACKED ME.
